content: this little scarf was made from vintage tapestry yarns in five shades of green found at a thrift store it would be fun out of most any yarn even using a variety of textures and colors it also doubles as a very hip belt scarf/belt instructions make 30 or more five-petal crocheted flowers for desired length of scarf stitch flowers end-to-end alternating attachment at third or fourth petal see photo below five petal crocheted flower with desired yarn and appropriate size crochet hook i e worsted weight and size g etc chain 5 and join with slip_stitch to first chain to form ring round 1 chain 2 counts as 1 double_crochet and work 15 double_crochet into the ring slip_stitch to beginning chain round 2 *chain 3 skip 2 double_crochet slip_stitch into next double_crochet repeat from * 4 more times ending in last stitch in base of beginning chain you now have five chained loops round 3 in each chain 3 space work 1sc 3 double_crochet 1 single_crochet join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet cut yarn leaving a tail for joining weave in all ends janknit designs © 2007 janknitdesigns@yahoo com
